summary: Police officer Jane Rydert's life goes into a tailspin the day her older sister, Cassidy, shows up at her door after sixteen years of confinement in a psychiatric hospital.
cast: Kelly Rutherford|Natasha Henstridge|Peyton List|Matthew Settle|Eric Breker|Jasmine Sky Sarin|Andrew Herr|Tim Perez|Lauren McNamara|Kadence Kendall Roach|Matthew MacCaull|Christopher Pearce|Joel Semande|Alex Zahara|Ken Camroux-Taylor|David Stuart|Mikayla Rothwell|Bob Bottieri|Matt Brown|Jaden Rain
title: Hermanas de sangre
